name: ghostpass-stress-tests
description: Stress testing suite for GhostPass 5,000-user pilot

scripts.test:entry: k6 run --env API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --env TEST_VENUE_ID=$TEST_VENUE_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID --env SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --env SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY scenarios/entry-scan-test.js
scripts.test:reentry: k6 run --env API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --env TEST_VENUE_ID=$TEST_VENUE_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID --env SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --env SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY scenarios/reentry-test.js
scripts.test:realistic: k6 run --env API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --env TEST_VENUE_ID=$TEST_VENUE_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID --env SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --env SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY scenarios/realistic-venue-test.js
scripts.test:concurrency: k6 run --env API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --env TEST_VENUE_ID=$TEST_VENUE_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID --env SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --env SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY scenarios/high-concurrency-monitor-test.js
scripts.test:full: k6 run --env API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --env TEST_VENUE_ID=$TEST_VENUE_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID scenarios/full-system-test.js
scripts.test:chaos: k6 run --env API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --env TEST_VENUE_ID=$TEST_VENUE_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_1_ID --env TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID=$TEST_GATEWAY_2_ID scenarios/failure-simulation-test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:entry && npm run test:concession && npm run test:wallet && npm run test:reentry
